txt.en: Challenge: A Light in the Darkness
Defeat Sagróg, the Bitter Warden after fully healing the Unseen Spear and forcing his surrender within 10 seconds

In the darkness of the Abyss of Mordath, it is the Bitter Warden who protects the most well-concealed secrets of the Dark Lord, but his identity has ever been a mystery to both the slaves and guards of the Mordath.

In the darkness of the Abyss of Mordath, it is the Bitter Warden who protects the most well-concealed secrets of the Dark Lord, but his identity has ever been a mystery to both the slaves and guards of the Mordath.
You and your fellows must defeat Sagróg, the Bitter Warden after fully healing the Unseen Spear.
